body:
So... I discovery the problem root.

In XMl bean file, I change the property "mappingDirectoryLocations" from "classpath:###/valueobjects/" to "file:#/EAP-7.0.0/standalone/deployments/###.war/WEB-INF/classes/bus/valueobjects/".

Absolute path is not a good solution, but I got something to investigate, maybe An weird environment relate to JBoss classloader and Spring classloader... I guess.
title: deploy old Struts / Spring WAR application in JBoss EAP 7 / JVM8
